questionTitle: Which of the following cloud storage is mainly meant for developers and to support applications built using Web services?
questionExplanation: Managed cloud storage is provisioned and provided as a raw disk.

questionOption1: Cloud storage may be broadly categorized into four major classes of storage
questionOption2: In unmanaged storage, the storage service provider makes storage capacity available to users
questionOption3: In managed storage, the storage service provider makes storage capacity available to users
questionExplanation: Unmanaged storage defines the nature of the storage, how it may be used, and by what applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the form of unmanaged cloud storage?
questionExplanation: It is unmanaged storage in the sense that the storage is preconfigured for you, you canâ€™t format as you like.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an example of an unmanaged storage utility set up to do automated backups?
questionExplanation: FreeDrive provides web-based applications that allow internet users to store, retrieve, and share data on the internet.

questionOption2: Managed storage is relatively cheap to use
questionOption3: Most of the user-based applications that work with cloud storage are of unmanaged type
questionExplanation: Unmanaged storage is relatively cheap to use.

questionTitle: Which of the following factors led to the demise of many of the early SSPs and to many hosted file services?
questionOption2: The inability of file-hosting companies to successfully monetize online storage
questionOption3: The continued commoditization of large disk drives
questionExplanation: SSP stands for Storage Service Provider.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the simplest unmanaged cloud storage device?
questionExplanation: File transfer services may be shared by other users you allow, and the files that are uploaded may be discoverable for some services.

questionTitle: The service FreeDrive is storage that allows ________ users to view the content of others.
questionExplanation: FreeDrive is a personal storage and file sharing service designed for users of social networks, such as Facebook, MySpace and Bebo.

questionTitle: Which of the following file transfer utility creates a shared folder metaphor using a Web service?
questionExplanation: Dropbox is a service that keeps your files safe, synced, and easy to share.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers Storage size of 10GB free t0 100 GB paid?
questionExplanation: As unmanaged storage offerings progressed in sophistication, they began to offer value-added software services such as folder synchronization and backup.
